resources.string: Developer by day, dreamer by night.

As a lifelong learner, I love to experiment with new tech and build cool things. 

You can find me tinkering with React Native and Android in my free time. 

I’m currently a student at Towson Universty pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science. 

I really appreciate you taking the time to learn about me — thanks!
A carpooling app designed for students to help each other get more involved in their community.
